svg.text: 1) Cliente -> Worker TCP: JSON header {'filename', 'size'} + raw bytes
2) Worker (follower) -> responds REDIRECT if not leader
3) If leader: leader calls Raft.replicate(command) where command includes base64(file)
4) Leader sends AppendEntries RPC (JSON over TCP with newline) to peers
5) On majority ack leader commits and persists file to storage and responds OK to client
